---
category: news
title: "Heidelberg University: New Centre For Model-Based Artificial Intelligence"
excerpt: "A centre for model-based artificial intelligence has been set up at Heidelberg University to link mathematical modelling methods with information processing in neuronal networks. The Carl Zeiss Foundation (CZS) is funding the CZS Heidelberg Center for Model-Based AI with five million euros over a period of six years."
